alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 4:36AM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches below 6000 feet and up to 16 inches across mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Winds gusting up to 45 mph at times may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Idaho portion of the northern Wasatch Mountains, including Emigration Summit. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travelers.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
